sections.title: Shorthand
sections.content: You can save on markup by passing the heading text as a prop directly.
examples: <flux:accordion.item heading="What's your refund policy?"> If you are not satisfied with your purchase, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. Please contact our support team for assistance.</flux:accordion.item>

sections.title: With transition
sections.content: Enable expanding transitions for smoother interactions.

sections.title: Disabled
sections.content: Restrict an accordion item from being expanded.

sections.title: Exclusive
sections.content: Enforce that only a single accordion item is expanded at a time.

sections.title: Expanded
sections.content: Expand a specific accordion by default.

sections.title: Leading icon
sections.content: Display the icon before the heading instead of after it.
